snippet: After closing its takeover of DirecTV, the telecommunications giant announced its offering includes high-definition and digital video recording services, wireless phone service and a data plan.
abstract: AT&T introduces new $200-per-month television and wireless service package under which users will be able watch TV on their smartphones; deal follows closely on company's 48.5 billion takeover of DirecTV.
lead_paragraph: After closing its takeover of DirecTV, the telecommunications giant announced its offering includes high-definition and digital video recording services, wireless phone service and a data plan.

headline.main: AT&T Says Users Can Watch TV on Any Device With Its New Bundle, the First of Its Kind
headline.print_headline: AT&T Says Users Can Watch TV on Any Device With Its New Bundle, the First of Its Kind
